Basic Plots.name: Basic line series
Basic Plots.text: An easy way to get started with line series.

Basic Plots.name: Basic bar series
Basic Plots.text: Get started with the bar series class.

Basic Plots.name: Basic stacked bar series
Basic Plots.text: A bar series that stacks the content.

Basic Plots.name: Basic scatter series
Basic Plots.text: Only a points series that explicitly sets X and Y coordinates.

Basic Plots.name: Basic bubble series
Basic Plots.text: Similar to a scatter series, but the points are weithed.

Basic Plots.name: Heat series
Basic Plots.text: Heat series based on the weight of every point.

Basic Plots.name: Axis sections
Basic Plots.text: A chart that highlights a range in an axis.

Basic Plots.name: Multiple axes
Basic Plots.text: A chart that scales its series in multiple axes.

Basic Plots.name: Data Labels
Basic Plots.text: Set DataLabels = true in any series to display a label in every point.
